content:
Last call for input on what our WG might do at next month's WG meeting. Deadline for meeting requests is tomorrow 8/7.

See discussion on the preliminary minutes of today's WG meeting.

Long story short, we agreed to let Virginia propose our published time slots, and we drafted some tentative ones.

I blocked time for our WG and put together a (very) rough agenda. See https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=91980216 for rough agenda.
This includes an intro and update on our group - Patient Empowerment Topic Based Session: Wednesday Morning 10:30AM-12PM - All our invited to "Introduction to Patient Empowerment: Our Mission, Priorities, and Projects"

Thanks Virginia. I have blocked these times out on my calendar. I am wondering if there are any other groups we could invite to our WG or we go to theirs and present as part of their agendas? I know I have done that in the past when trying to educate on a new WG.
